import { Controls, Canvas, Meta } from '@storybook/blocks';
import * as VisualDescription from './visual-description.stories';

<Meta of={VisualDescription} />

# VisualDescription

## Overview

The VisualDescription component is used to display a visual description with a title, accompanying text and an optional code block.
It can be used to provide visual explanations along with textual descriptions.

<Canvas of={VisualDescription.Overview} />
